column5: Any insight on Tobin Lake? I know a lot fish the river but the last couple of years the current has been to strong to fish or too dirty when I was there.
What time of year are you going. Try fishing the lake. The lake has monsters in it to.
Going the week of June 24. Not sure if most bottom bounce,plugs or just jig for them. We mostly uses leeches. Advice on any hot spots would be great
